attributes.action: Investigate the Monopoly of b-Sky-b in particular the High Definition Transmissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has become apparent that the hold that Sky has over existing and new customers is becoming intolerable, surely as the only real provider of satellite transmissions in the country they should have a responsibility to also make it affordable and not openly extort more than reasonable profit out of the consumer.
With the imminent arrival of free view High Definition viewing only just around the corner is it just that Sky contract you for an extortionate yearly fee and also make you pay yet again to upgrade existing equipment without a single ounce of conscience.
I petition to stop Sky running rough shod over it’s client base and introduce a fair pricing strategy.
